item.title: 云存储需求增长，西部数据预测季度盈利强劲
item.description: 西部数据（Western Digital）周四预计第二季度盈利将高于华尔街预期，押注云计算提供商提高数据中心容量后对其数据存储产品的更高需求。【原文：Western Digital forecast second-quarter earnings above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, betting on higher demand for its data storage products as cloud providers increase data center capacity.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行下半年利润减少逾 7.21 亿澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行（ANZ）周五警告称，该银行下半年的税后盈利将受到11.1亿澳元（7.2128亿美元）的冲击，原因是该银行计入了与重组和监管和解等事项相关的一次性费用。【原文：Australia's ANZ warned on Friday that its second-half earnings would take a hit of A$1.11 billion ($721.28 million) after tax, as the lender booked one-off charges tied to matters including restructuring and regulatory settlements.】

item.title: 特朗普核试验令或将促进霍尼韦尔、BWX Technology 等公司的发展
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统下令国防部开始进行核武器试验，这可能会给少数几家主导美国核武器基础设施的专业公司带来价值数十亿美元的合同。【原文：President Donald Trump's order for the Defense Department to start testing nuclear weapons could lead to billions of dollars' worth of contracts for a handful of specialized companies that dominate the United States' nuclear weapons infrastructure.】

item.title: 由英特尔前首席执行官盖尔辛格担任技术主管的 Gloo 在首次公开募股中寻求近 9 亿美元的估值
item.description: Gloo Holdings是一家宗教导向型技术公司，该公司在周四提交的一份文件中表示，正在寻求在美国首次公开募股中获得高达8.734亿美元的估值，这凸显了新股发行的强劲势头。【原文：Gloo Holdings, a religious-oriented technology firm, is seeking a valuation of up to $873.4 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the company said in a filing on Thursday, underscoring a strong momentum for fresh offerings.】

item.title: Meta 将发行价值高达 300 亿美元的债券
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 在周四提交的一份文件中表示，该公司将通过发行价值高达 300 亿美元的债券来筹集资金，因为大科技公司正急于为人工智能基础设施耗资巨大的扩张提供资金。【原文：Social media giant Meta Platforms will raise money through bond offerings worth up to $30 billion, it said in a filing on Thursday, as Big Tech rushes to fund the costly expansion of artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: GoDaddy 上调 2025 年收入预期，以满足人工智能驱动的需求
item.description: GoDaddy 周四上调了年度收入展望，预计其互联网托管服务新增的人工智能功能将促进销售额的增长。【原文：GoDaddy raised its annual revenue outlook on Thursday, expecting to boost sales from the addition of artificial intelligence features to its internet hosting services.】

item.title: 交易日 科技贸易，特朗普与习近平的解读
item.description: 在美联储 "鹰派 "降息之后，华尔街科技股在周四遭受重创，而美元和美国债券收益率则进一步上涨，投资者也在消化中美领导人峰会的结果。【原文：Tech shares on Wall Street took a beating on Thursday after some megacap earnings reports, while the dollar and U.S. bond yields rose further following the Fed's "hawkish" rate cut as investors also digested the outcome of the U.S.-China leaders' summit.】

item.title: 消息人士称，DOGE 将离开美国最高市场监管机构
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士周四告诉路透社，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府效率部（Department of Government Efficiency initiative）（简称 DOGE）已经结束了在美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）的工作，并将于本周撤出该机构。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's Department of Government Efficiency initiative, or DOGE, has wrapped up work at the Securities and Exchange Commission and will exit the agency this week, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: Netflix 宣布进行十股对一股的股票分割
item.description: Netflix 周四宣布了一项普通股十股对一股的提前拆股计划，使散户投资者更容易买到公司股票。【原文：Netflix on Thursday announced a ten-for-one forward stock split plan of its common stock, making the company's shares more affordable for retail investors.】

item.title: OpenAI、甲骨文与相关数字公司计划在密歇根州建立 1 千兆瓦的星际之门数据中心
item.description: OpenAI、甲骨文和相关数字公司周四表示，他们将在密歇根州萨林镇（Saline Township）建设一个超过 1 千兆瓦的数据中心园区，作为星际之门（Stargate）推动扩大美国人工智能基础设施能力的一部分。【原文：OpenAI, Oracle and Related Digital said on Thursday they would build a data-center campus of more than 1 gigawatt in Saline Township, Michigan, as part of their Stargate push to expand U.S. artificial intelligence infrastructure capacity.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官预计假日季度 iPhone 销售额将超过华尔街预期
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）周四对假日季度的 iPhone 销售和整体收入做出了超出华尔街预期的预测，原因是在供应持续紧张的情况下，该公司正在争分夺秒地完成 iPhone 17 机型的订单。【原文：Apple Chief Executive Tim Cook on Thursday gave a forecast for holiday quarter iPhone sales and overall revenue that beat Wall Street expectations, powered by orders for iPhone 17 models that the company is racing to fulfill amid continuing supply constraints.】

item.title: 需求稳定，摩托罗拉第四季度营收预计高于预期
item.description: 受政府机构对其安全产品和关键通信设备的稳定需求推动，摩托罗拉解决方案公司周四公布的第三季度利润超出预期，并预计本季度收入增长将高于预期。【原文：Motorola Solutions beat third-quarter profit estimate and forecast current-quarter revenue growth above expectations on Thursday, driven by steady demand for its security products and critical communications equipment from government agencies.】

item.title: 受人工智能提振，Monolithic Power 预计第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: Monolithic Power Systems 公司周四预测第四季度营收将高于预期，预计随着人工智能热潮推动数据中心扩张，对其电源控制产品和半导体的需求将十分强劲。【原文：Monolithic Power Systems forecast fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on Thursday, expecting strong demand for its power control products and semiconductors as the artificial intelligence boom drives data center expansion.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英特尔正在洽谈收购人工智能芯片初创公司 SambaNova
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，芯片制造商英特尔正在洽谈收购人工智能处理器制造商 SambaNova。【原文：Chipmaker Intel is in talks to acquire artificial intelligence processor maker SambaNova, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 利润因交易量增长而激增
item.description: Coinbase Global 周四报告称，由于数字资产波动加剧，加密货币交易所的交易量增加，该公司第三季度利润大幅增长，盘后股价上涨超过 3%。【原文：Coinbase Global reported a jump in its third-quarter profit on Thursday, as heightened volatility in digital assets boosted trading volumes at the cryptocurrency exchange, sending its shares up more than 3% after the bell.】

item.title: Roku 季度营收符合预期，股价下跌
item.description: Roku 公布的第三季度营收符合华尔街预期，但受到激烈竞争和客户广告支出减少的影响，股价在盘后交易中下跌近 7%。【原文：Roku reported third-quarter revenue that was in line with Wall Street estimates, hurt by tough competition and reduced advertising spend from clients, sending shares down nearly 7% in trading after the bell.】

item.title: Reddit 节假日季度预测显示人工智能广告战略初见成效
item.description: Reddit 周四预计第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这要归功于其人工智能驱动的广告工具，这些工具正在促进社交媒体平台的营销支出。【原文：Reddit forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, thanks to its artificial intelligence-powered advertising tools that are boosting marketing spending on the social media platform.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动连接需求增长，流明亏损减少
item.description: 受人工智能热潮对其网络基础设施的需求推动，以支持海量数据流和计算工作负载，路明技术公司（Lumen Technologies）周四公布的第三季度营收超过预期，亏损也小于预期。【原文：Lumen Technologies edged past third-quarter revenue estimate and posted a smaller-than-expected loss on Thursday, driven by demand for its network infrastructure to support massive data flows and computational workloads amid an AI boom.】

item.title: 亚马逊预测季度营收大幅低于预期
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周四预测的季度营收基本低于华尔街预期，原因是零售业务疲软，而企业继续在人工智能方面不遗余力地投入，对其云服务的需求强劲。【原文：Amazon.com forecast quarterly revenue largely below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, hurt by a weaker retail business as strong demand for its cloud services as businesses continue to spend relentlessly on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 预防药物助力艾滋病销售额增长，吉利德公司利润增加
item.description: 吉利德科学公司（Gilead Sciences）周四表示，其第三季度艾滋病药物销售额增长了 4%，达到 53 亿美元，其中新的预防药物 Yeztugo 的销售额达到 3900 万美元，帮助其利润超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：Gilead Sciences said on Thursday its HIV drug sales rose 4% to $5.3 billion in the third quarter including $39 million for its new prevention drug Yeztugo, helping to boost its profit above Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美联储鲍曼拟削减银行监管部门约 30
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）的最高银行警察米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）宣布，计划重组该机构的监督和监管部门，并将该部门的人员缩减约 30%。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve's top bank cop, Michelle Bowman, announced plans to reorganize the agency's supervision and regulation division and shrink the unit's staff by roughly 30%, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Globalstar 在出售过程中吸引了 SpaceX 的兴趣
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周四援引知情人士的话报道称，Globalstar 正在探索潜在的出售方案，并已与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司以及其他潜在买家进行了早期讨论。【原文：Globalstar is exploring a potential sale and has held early discussions with Elon Musk's SpaceX among other prospective buyers, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，福特将在印度投资 3.7 亿美元生产新型发动机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一位熟知内情的人士的话报道，福特正计划在印度投资约 3.7 亿美元生产新型发动机。【原文：Ford is planning to invest about $370 million in India to make new engines, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普和习近平同意暂停征收中断贸易的港口费
item.description: 美国和中国周四同意暂停对对方船只征收针锋相对的费用，这些费用已成为世界两大经济体之间更广泛贸易战的主要刺激因素，并推高了海运成本。【原文：The U.S. and China agreed on Thursday to pause tit-for-tat fees on each other's ships that became a major irritant in the broader trade war between the world's two largest economies and pushed up ocean freight costs.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英伟达将向人工智能初创公司 Poolside 投资最多 10 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，英伟达（Nvidia）将向人工智能公司 Poolside 投资最多 10 亿美元，这笔交易将使这家初创公司的估值翻两番。【原文：Nvidia will invest up to $1 billion in AI company Poolside, in a deal that would quadruple the startup's valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易休战后，中国的投资能力有所增强
item.description: 中国与美国达成的最新贸易休战协议消除了外国投资者的一大顾虑，他们全年都对投资中国股市持谨慎态度，而中国股市则以 2019 年以来最强劲的年度表现超越了大多数其他主要股市。【原文：China's latest trade truce with the United States removes one big deterrent for foreign investors who've been circumspect all year about investing in a stock market that's outrun most other major ones with its strongest annual run since 2019.】

item.title: 去中心化加密货币交易所 dYdX 计划年底前进入美国市场
item.description: 顶级去中心化加密货币交易平台之一 dYdX 的总裁在接受路透社采访时表示，dYdX 正准备在今年年底前进入美国市场，这是这家以衍生品为重点的交易所的一次转变，此前美国用户无法使用该平台。【原文：One of the top decentralized cryptocurrency trading platforms, dYdX, is preparing to enter the U.S. market by the end of the year, in a shift for the derivatives-focused exchange that was previously not available to American users, the president of dYdX told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 贝森特称中国本季将购买 1200 万吨大豆
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四表示，在长达数月的关税战停止了对美国本季大豆的所有采购后，中国已同意在本季至1月期间购买1200万吨美国大豆，低于上一季的2250万吨。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Thursday that China has agreed to buy 12 million metric tons of American soybeans during the current season through January, down from 22.5 million tons in the prior season after a months-long tariff battle halted all purchases of the current U.S. harvest.】

item.title: 看涨期权交易将推动标普 500 指数在 7,000 点附近波动
item.description: 据期权专家称，一波看涨期权交易放大了美国股市向另一个重要里程碑迈进的步伐，并使交易商们做好了在未来几天或几周内市场波动可能会被夸大的准备。【原文：A wave of bullish options trading has amplified the U.S. stock market's advance toward another major milestone and left dealers positioned so that market swings are likely to be exaggerated in coming days or weeks, according to options specialists.】

item.title: 诺和诺德改变策略，大胆突袭辉瑞肥胖症交易
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）迟迟未能阻止辉瑞（Pfizer）对美国肥胖症生物技术公司 Metsera 的收购，这标志着这家丹麦制药商正在积极转变，在新任首席执行官和董事会的领导下，力图在减肥药市场重振雄风。【原文：Novo Nordisk's late bid to hijack Pfizer's takeover of U.S. obesity biotech Metsera marks an aggressive shift from the Danish drugmaker as it seeks to regain ground in the weight-loss drug market under a new CEO and board.】
